pages.title: Black Softshell Turtle
pages.text: The Indian softshell turtle ($(o)Nilssonia gangetica$()), or Ganges softshell turtle is a species of softshell turtle found in South Asia in rivers such as the Ganges, Indus and Mahanadi.$(br2)This vulnerable turtle reaches a carapace length of up to 94 cm ($(o)37 in).

pages.title: Black Softshell Turtle
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:cod$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
